name: Horde Jacket
description:
Carrying Capacity: 2K µSCU
Complementary pieces come together to form the Horde. This striking jacket from 987 features a strong asymmetrical design with a high-lo hem and aggressive detailing on the sleeves. 
Women's sizes currently out of stock.
description_cn:
储物空间：2K μSCU
相辅相成的材料结合在一起，成了“部落”。这件夺人眼球的夹克由987出产，有着激进的非对称设计以及标志性的高低褶边和衣袖上的极致细节。
女款暂时缺货。

shop_buy.layout_name_cn: 斯坦顿(Stanton)-十字军(Crusader)-耶拉(Yela)-六角湾(Grim HEX)-KCTrending_GrimHEX
